Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah picked up two wickets in the very first over of his return to international cricket after a gap of 11 months.
Bumrah cleaned up Andrew Balbirnie with a ball that took the faintest of inside edges and crashed onto the stumps.
Bumrah dismissed Lorcan Tucker with a ball that ballooned up in the air and was caught by Sanju Samson.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions were heavily in favour of swing bowling with a constant breeze in Malahide.
Jasprit Bumrah is leading India in this three-match T20I series, becoming the first fast bowler to captain India in the shortest format of the game.
